title: Submission
description: Welcome to the Plume – where members are bound by desire and fantasies come true…Lifestyle reporter Joanna is prepared to do whatever is necessary to get the story about the notorious private club known as the Plume - even apply for membership. Rex will do anything to protect his club and the privacy of his membership - and he isn't averse to teaching Joanna a lesson about curiosity - and control. They both get more than expected when Joanna's own secret desires are revealed.
author: Ella Ardent
